install.name: JFusion Magento cart
install.author: JFusion Development Team
install.description: This module will display a box with the current cart of the user. You need to have the magelib plugin system installed.

field.name: enable_scriptaculous
field.label: Scriptaculous enable
field.description: Enable or not the scriptaculous script from Magento. Some modules of Magento need it for Ajax call or rollover/menu effect. BE AWARE: not compatible with module or content using Mootools of Joomla

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
